statements: SELECT * FROM home_insurance_reports WHERE policy_id = 1001;
SELECT policy_id, policy_holder, claim_amount FROM home_insurance_reports WHERE customer_satisfaction_rating > 4;
SELECT policy_holder, claim_date FROM home_insurance_reports WHERE claim_amount > 5000;
SELECT * FROM home_insurance_reports ORDER BY policy_start_date DESC, customer_satisfaction_rating ASC;
SELECT AVG(claim_amount) AS average_claim_amount FROM home_insurance_reports;
SELECT policy_holder, claim_amount, policy_start_date FROM home_insurance_reports WHERE policy_end_date >= '2022-01-01';

SELECT AVG(claim_amount) AS average_claim_amount, MAX(customer_satisfaction_rating) AS max_satisfaction_rating FROM home_insurance_reports WHERE policy_start_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM home_insurance_reports ORDER BY claim_date DESC, customer_satisfaction_rating ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT policy_holder, claim_amount FROM home_insurance_reports WHERE claim_amount >= 5000 AND customer_satisfaction_rating >= 4 ORDER BY claim_amount DESC;
SELECT policy_holder, claim_date, DATEDIFF(policy_end_date, policy_start_date) AS policy_duration FROM home_insurance_reports WHERE policy_duration > 365;
SELECT * FROM insurance_policies;
SELECT policy_id, policy_type, premium_amount FROM insurance_policies ORDER BY premium_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_id, policy_type, start_date, end_date FROM insurance_policies WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT policy_id, claim_date, claim_amount FROM claims_history WHERE claim_status = 'Approved' ORDER BY claim_amount DESC;
SELECT policy_id, customer_id, policy_type, premium_amount, start_date FROM insurance_policies WHERE customer_id = 12345;
SELECT * FROM insurance_policies
SELECT policy_id, policy_type, premium_amount FROM insurance_policies WHERE customer_id = 1234
SELECT * FROM claims_history WHERE claim_status = 'Approved'
SELECT policy_id, start_date, end_date FROM insurance_policies WHERE premium_amount > 1000
SELECT claim_id, claim_date, claim_amount FROM claims_history ORDER BY claim_date DESC
SELECT * FROM home_insurance_policies;
SELECT policy_holder_name, policy_start_date, coverage_amount FROM home_insurance_policies WHERE policy_end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT claim_id, claim_amount, claim_status FROM claims_history WHERE claim_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM customer_satisfaction_metrics WHERE satisfaction_rating >= 4;
SELECT policy_holder_name, policy_start_date, policy_end_date FROM home_insurance_policies ORDER BY policy_start_date DESC, policy_end_date ASC;
SELECT policy_holder_name, coverage_amount FROM home_insurance_policies WHERE policy_start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM claims_history WHERE claim_amount > 5000 ORDER BY claim_date DESC;
SELECT policy_holder_name, coverage_amount FROM home_insurance_policies WHERE coverage_amount BETWEEN 10000 AND 50000;
SELECT policy_holder_name, claim_amount FROM home_insurance_policies JOIN claims_history ON home_insurance_policies.policy_id = claims_history.policy_id WHERE claim_status = 'Approved';

SELECT policy_holder_name, satisfaction_rating FROM home_insurance_policies JOIN customer_satisfaction_metrics ON home_insurance_policies.policy_id = customer_satisfaction_metrics.policy_id WHERE satisfaction_rating >= 4 ORDER BY satisfaction_rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM insurance_policies
SELECT policy_holder_name, policy_type, premium_amount FROM insurance_policies
SELECT claim_id, policy_id, claim_date, claim_amount, claim_status FROM claims_history
SELECT analysis_type, analysis_details FROM business_analysis
SELECT survey_id, survey_date, satisfaction_rating FROM customer_satisfaction
SELECT * FROM insurance_policies WHERE policy_holder_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT policy_holder_name, premium_amount FROM insurance_policies WHERE premium_amount > 5000;
SELECT MAX(premium_amount) AS max_premium FROM insurance_policies;
SELECT policy_holder_name, policy_type, premium_amount FROM insurance_policies ORDER BY premium_amount DESC;
SELECT policy_holder_name, start_date, end_date FROM insurance_policies WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM home_insurance_policies;
SELECT policy_holder_name, property_address FROM home_insurance_policies ORDER BY policy_id DESC;
SELECT policy_holder_name, coverage_amount FROM home_insurance_policies WHERE coverage_amount > 5000;
SELECT policy_id, property_address, coverage_amount FROM home_insurance_policies WHERE policy_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM customer_satisfaction_metrics WHERE customer_rating >= 4 ORDER BY survey_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM home_insurance_policies WHERE coverage_amount > 5000 ORDER BY policy_holder_name DESC;

SELECT policy_id, property_address FROM home_insurance_policies JOIN claims_history ON home_insurance_policies.policy_id = claims_history.policy_id WHERE claim_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';

SELECT policy_holder_name, customer_rating FROM home_insurance_policies JOIN customer_satisfaction_metrics ON home_insurance_policies.policy_id = customer_satisfaction_metrics.policy_id WHERE customer_rating > 4;

SELECT policy_id, policy_holder_name, claim_date FROM home_insurance_policies JOIN claims_history ON home_insurance_policies.policy_id = claims_history.policy_id JOIN claim_status ON claims_history.claim_id = claim_status.claim_id WHERE status = 'Approved';
SELECT * FROM home_insurance_policies hp JOIN policy_types pt ON hp.policy_id = pt.policy_type_id WHERE coverage_amount >= 10000;
